fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: Press Freedom, Digital Agenda, Single Market, Data Protection and Privacy, Copyright, Taxes (VAT, Corporate Taxes), Competition, Advertising, E-Commerce
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Verband Deutscher Zeitschriftenverleger, European Magazine Media Association, European Publishers Council, Open Internet Project
goals__remit: Burda is an internationally operating media and technology company with about 440 printed and digital media products. In fiscal year 2016, approx. 10,000 individuals were employed in the Group. Burda's external sales reached €2.25 billion.
